**Example 1: 示例**

示例

Input: 

```
tccli wedata DescribeCodeDetailV2 --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Id abc \
    --Name abc \
    --Type abc
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Data": {
            "Id": "abc",
            "Name": "abc",
            "Type": "abc",
            "ResourceId": "abc",
            "FileExtensionType": "abc",
            "Bucket": "abc",
            "RemotePath": "abc",
            "Region": "abc",
            "ExtraInfo": "abc",
            "LocalPath": "abc"
        },
        "RequestId": "abc"
    }
}
```
